layout.title: Local SEO Services | Rank #1 on Google Maps
layout.description: Complete local SEO services for spas and massage businesses. Dominate local search results, rank #1 on Google Maps, and get found by customers searching in your area.

hero.title: Dominate Local Search & Get Found First
hero.text: When someone searches 'Thai massage near me' or 'spa in [your city]', you need to be the first business they see. Our local SEO service gets you to #1 on Google Maps and local search results, bringing you a constant stream of new customers.
hero.imageAlt: Number one ranking on Google Maps

services.title: Local Customers Are Searching Right Now
services.text: Every day, hundreds of people in your area search for massage and spa services on Google. If you're not showing up in the top 3 results, you're invisible. We get you to the top and keep you there.

items.title: Rank #1 on Google Maps
items.text: Most customers choose from the top 3 businesses on Google Maps. We optimize your Google Business Profile to consistently rank in the top positions for your target keywords.

items.title: Complete Google Business Profile Optimization
items.text: Professional photos, compelling descriptions, proper categories, regular posts, and review management. We handle everything to make your profile irresistible to customers.

items.title: Consistent NAP Across the Web
items.text: Your business name, address, and phone number must be identical across all directories. We ensure consistency across 50+ platforms to boost your local search rankings.

reviews.title: How Local SEO Brought These Businesses to #1

items.text: We went from page 3 of Google to position #2 on Google Maps in just 4 months. Our phone hasn't stopped ringing since. We're getting 40+ enquiries per week just from Google, compared to maybe 5-10 before. The ROI is incredible.
items.name: Amanda Roberts
items.title: Owner, Thai Bliss Massage

items.text: We're now #1 for 'Thai massage Manchester' and appear in the top 3 for dozens of other local searches. Our bookings have tripled, and 70% of our new customers say they found us on Google. Best marketing investment we've ever made.
items.name: Peter Hughes
items.title: Director, Serenity Spa Manchester

features.boxText: 50+ Businesses Ranking #1 in Their Local Area
features.title: Everything You Need to Dominate Local Search
features.text: Local SEO isn't just one thing - it's a combination of dozens of factors that Google uses to determine who ranks first. We handle all of them so you can focus on serving the customers we send you.

items.title: Google Business Profile Optimization
items.text: Complete optimization of your Google Business Profile with professional photos, compelling descriptions, proper categories, and regular posts to maximize visibility.

items.title: Review Generation & Management
items.text: Systematic process to generate 5-star reviews and respond professionally to all feedback. More reviews = higher rankings and more customer trust.

items.title: Local Citations & Directory Listings
items.text: Consistent NAP (Name, Address, Phone) across 50+ directories including Yelp, Bing, Apple Maps, and industry-specific directories. Builds authority and rankings.

items.title: Website Local SEO
items.text: Optimize your website for local search terms. Proper schema markup, location pages, and content that targets local keywords customers actually search for.

items.title: Competitor Analysis & Strategy
items.text: We analyse your competitors who rank above you, identify what they're doing right, and implement strategies to outrank them systematically.

items.title: Monthly Ranking Reports
items.text: Track your progress with detailed monthly reports showing your rankings for key search terms, traffic growth, and the ROI of your SEO investment.
